This is a project I made in 2019, the first day counted from the chinese new year. Hope you like them. @Grace

  • Day 01

    Chinese word "FU" means for "Good Lucky". Wish all the people that suffered

  • Day 02

    Play in the royal garden.

  • Day 05

    Chinese cabbage(白菜 Bai Cai) as the same pronunciation with "Rich (财 Cai)".  So it's always good means for people.

  • Day 06
